name: Nature's Guardians
title: Most Protected Land
description: In 2024, Seychelles had 68.1% of its land designated as terrestrial protected areas, showcasing its commitment to preserving natural habitats.

name: Aid Reliant
title: High Aid Dependency
description: In 2021, Seychelles received $50,000 in net official aid, highlighting its reliance on international support for development.

name: Tetanus-Free Newborns
title: Best Newborn Tetanus Protection
description: By 2023, Seychelles achieved a 100% rate of newborns protected against tetanus, ensuring the health and safety of its youngest citizens.

name: Aquaculture Anomaly
title: Minimal Aquaculture Production
description: In 2017, Seychelles reported only 0.1 metric tons of aquaculture production, indicating a minimal focus on this sector.

name: Swedish Support
title: Sweden's Modest Aid Contribution
description: In 2017, Seychelles received $9,999.99 in bilateral aid from Sweden, reflecting a modest level of support from this donor nation.
